resources.string: 1. Which United player was involved in a dressing room argument in 2003 with Alex Ferguson?
2. Which City did United play the 2008 Champions League Final?
3. Name Two Different players that wore the Number 7 shirt at United.
4. What is the first name of the Bulgarian striker that was signed from Tottenham?
5. in 2014-2015 League Cup play, Manchester United was thrashed by which League One side?
6. Which Country does Diego Forlan come from?
7. Which Two Players were signed from other clubs by Louis Van Gaal?
8. Robin Van Persie scored how many Premier League goals in the 2013-2014 season?
9. Who was voted Sir Matt Busby Player of the year in 2011-2012 season?
10. Who took over as Manchester United shirt sponsor in 2014?
